description:
Say hello to the great outdoors in style with the practical Kirkwood Shirt. Designed to go the distance whether you’re en route to your destination or heading out on a day hike, this men’s shirt is made to stretch and move with you.
Feeling the heat? Then you’ll love the back vent with a mesh detail which allows extra airflow—perfect for the hot afternoon sun. While on the topic, this shirt delivers UPF 30+ protection too. There’s only so much sun one can take, right?
As if all that wasn’t enough, the Kirkwood Shirt delivers a classic plaid print with double chest pockets and a standard fit with comfort to spare, making it an easy go-anywhere, do-anything addition to your closet.
name: Prana Kirkwood Shirt - Mens
